habitDefinitions.name: Thought Record
habitDefinitions.description: Identify and reframe negative thoughts using CBT techniques

habitDefinitions.name: Gratitude Journal
habitDefinitions.description: Write down three things you're grateful for today

habitDefinitions.name: Physical Exercise
habitDefinitions.description: Any form of physical activity for at least 20 minutes

habitDefinitions.name: Worry Time
habitDefinitions.description: Schedule specific time to address worries, then let them go

habitDefinitions.name: Sleep Hygiene
habitDefinitions.description: Maintain consistent sleep schedule and bedtime routine

habitDefinitions.name: Mindful Eating
habitDefinitions.description: Practice being present and mindful during one meal
